question: ankit kaun hai
answer: Ankit Kumar Pandit ek aspiring engineer aur AI/ML enthusiast hai jo B.Tech CSE (AI/ML) kar raha hai.

question: ankit kya padh raha hai
answer: Ankit Computer Science and Engineering me B.Tech kar raha hai with specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

question: ankit kaha padh raha hai
answer: Ankit Dev Bhoomi Uttarakhand University, Dehradun me padh raha hai.

question: ankit ka background kya hai
answer: Ankit originally Bihar se hai aur currently Dehradun me apni engineering studies ke liye rehta hai.

question: ankit ke skills kya hai
answer: Ankit ko Python, C, C++, HTML, CSS, JavaScript aur AI/ML tools ka experience hai.

question: ankit ne kaunse projects kiye hai
answer: Ankit ne Hybrid Safety Sensor Software, AI/ML Workshop organization aur College Website Development project par kaam kiya hai.

question: hybrid safety sensor project kya hai
answer: Ye ek AI/ML based smartwatch safety project hai jo heart rate monitoring, GPS tracking aur emergency alerts provide karta hai.

question: ankit ke interests kya hai
answer: Ankit ko coding, writing, video editing, cricket aur volleyball pasand hai.

question: ankit ka lifestyle kaisa hai
answer: Ankit ek fitness enthusiast hai aur daily one-hour workout routine follow karta hai.

question: ankit ka goal kya hai
answer: Ankit ka goal ek skilled engineer banna hai aur technology industry me grow karna hai.
